description:
Hoshizora Miyuki is a second year student who recently transferred to class 2 of Nanairogaoka Public Middle School, and later becomes a member of the school`s cheerleading squad. She has an interest in books, especially fairy tales. Like most of the lead Cures before her, Miyuki is cheerful and optimistic, but also something of a klutz. Her catchphrase is "Ultra Happy!". Her potential as a Pretty Cure awakened while protecting Candy from Wolfrun. As Cure Happy, her dark magenta hair becomes lighter in shade and her pigtails grow longer, and her theme color is magenta. She can manipulate light energy in this form.
She introduces herself as "Twinkling, shining, light of the future! Cure Happy!"
name: Hoshizora Miyuki
